title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow, I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, a Windows 'ding' sound is heard (the bell sound that usually indicates an error).
EB: I do not expect to hear the Windows 'ding' sound when I choose SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText.
SR:
1. Launch the ControlExampleText application.
2. Select the SWT.MULTI option.
3. Observe if a Windows 'ding' sound is heard.
